text: Timothy Malcolm Healy (born 29 January 1952) is an English actor. He is best known for portraying the roles of Dennis Patterson in the ITV-BBC comedy-drama series Auf Wiedersehen, Pet (1983–1986, 2002–2004), Les/Lesley Conroy in the ITV sitcom Benidorm (2009–2018), and Gastric in the BBC sitcom Still Open All Hours (2014–present). He has also made appearances in various British television series, including Coronation Street, Emmerdale, Casualty, The Grand and Waterloo Road. ==Personal life== Healy married actress Denise Welch in 1988. They had two sons before divorcing in 2012; their oldest son, Matthew, is the lead singer of The 1975. Healy married Joan Anderton in 2015. He is an strong supporter of Newcastle United FC. ==Other websites== * Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:English voice actors Category:People from Newcastle upon Tyne
title: Tim Healy
